availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Julian Dryden. Father of Emily Dryden, Harriett W. Dryden, Robert L. Dryden, Sarah A. Dryden, Nancy Dryden, Mary E. Dryden, Noble Dryden, Julia Dryden, and John Dryden. Farmer in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed William Gilmore as a laborer in Mason County in 1850. Farmer in Mason County in 1860. Employed Robert L. Dryden as a farm laborer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 93B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 114.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Orangeburg, p. 489A.
